mapper.insert: INSERT INTO com_intro(comno, com_name, com_form, com_type, sales, homepage,address,num_people,edate,ceo_name,cor_memberno) VALUES(comintro_seq.nextval, #{com_name},#{com_form},#{com_type},#{sales},#{homepage},#{address},#{num_people},#{edate},#{ceo_name},#{cor_memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT comno, com_name, com_form,com_type, sales, homepage,address,num_people,edate,ceo_name,visible FROM com_intro ORDER BY comno ASC
